Class nsi.registry.client.java.rrp.api.Response 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----nsi.registry.client.java.rrp.api.Response
public class Response
extends Object
This class represents the various components of an RRP response.

Response(String)
Parses an RRP text response and extracts and stores the various components.

displayResponse(Response)
getAttributes()
Returns any attributes, if applicable, extracted from the original RRP text response.
getCode()
Returns the RRP response code extracted from the original RRP text response.
getDescription()
Returns the RRP response description extracted from the original RRP text response.
getRawResponse()
Returns the original RRP text response string used to instantiate object.

Response 
 public Response(String data) throws InvalidArgumentException, InvalidResponseFormatException
Parses an RRP text response and extracts and stores the various components.

Parameters:
data - an RRP text response.
Throws: InvalidArgumentException
if data is null.
Throws: InvalidResponseFormatException
if data is not a properly formatted RRP response.

displayResponse 
 public static void displayResponse(Response response)
getRawResponse 
 public String getRawResponse()
Returns the original RRP text response string used to instantiate object.

Returns:
the original RRP text response.
getCode 
 public int getCode()
Returns the RRP response code extracted from the original RRP text response.

Returns:
the RRP response code.
getDescription 
 public String getDescription()
Returns the RRP response description extracted from the original RRP text response.

Returns:
the RRP response description.
getAttributes 
 public Hashtable getAttributes()
Returns any attributes, if applicable, extracted from the original RRP text response.

Returns:
response attributes if any exist, null otherwise.
